title: IT Consulting
description: Strategic technology planning and advice for small businesses. I'll help you figure out what technology you actually need and how to make it work together efficiently.

title: Remote Technical Support
description: Troubleshooting and fixing technology problems for homes and businesses. Computer acting weird? Printer won't connect? I can help sort it out.

title: On-Site Services
description: Sometimes you need someone to come to you. I'll come to your home or business for installations, upgrades, or anything that needs hands-on attention.
